meanings.definition: A high-ranking Shiite religious leader in Iran.
meanings.sent1: The ayatollah led the prayers at the mosque.
meanings.sent2: People gathered to listen to the ayatollah's sermon.
meanings.sent3: The ayatollah tried to tell a joke during his speech, but it fell flat.
meanings.sent4: The influence of the ayatollah spread like wildfire among the faithful.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ayatollah in his traditional robes was striking.

meanings.definition: A title given to the highest-ranking clerics in the Shiite Islamic faith.
meanings.sent1: When visiting Iran, it is customary to show respect to an ayatollah.
meanings.sent2: The ayatollah's wisdom and guidance were highly valued by his followers.
meanings.sent3: The ayatollah accidentally spilled tea on his robes during a formal event.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of his followers, the ayatollah was a beacon of hope.
meanings.sent5: The authority of the ayatollah was unquestioned in matters of faith.
